title: The First Vision
description: Xenu speaks. His words burn your mind. You must declare what you’ve seen.

choices.title: Proclaim Xenu
choices.description: You shout Xenu’s name. Your followers quake. They await your word.
choices.message: The crowd erupts, their faith now a flame. You stand as the divine vessel, stronger than ever before. They are yours to lead.

choices.title: Speak in Riddles
choices.description: You speak in riddles. Their eyes widen. The authorities listen.
choices.message: The whispers of your cryptic words grow. Some are shaken, some intrigued. Yet, eyes from outside grow sharper, and the pressure mounts.

title: The Silence Ritual
description: The silence is the test. You must choose how long they stay silent.

choices.title: Silence for 7 Days
choices.description: Seven days. The followers endure. The silence stretches.
choices.message: They submit. The days drag on, but the followers are changed. They feel your power, and their faith becomes unshakable.

choices.title: Silence for 30 Days
choices.description: Thirty days. The silence is endless. The authorities stare.
choices.message: The silence wears on. It breaks them. Your followers grow restless, and the government notices. Their eyes are now upon you.

title: The Sacrifice of the Mind
description: They must give their minds to ascend. Who will go first?

choices.title: Sacrifice the Weakest
choices.description: The weakest give all. The strong are stirred. The choice is made.
choices.message: They follow. The weak fall, their minds sacrificed. But the rest are emboldened, stronger in their belief. Your following grows.

choices.title: Sacrifice All
choices.description: All must give. The sacrifice will be total.
choices.message: All submit. The act is complete, but the world takes notice. The authorities tighten their gaze, and whispers of madness grow louder.

title: The Gathering of the Flock
description: They come. The gathering. It is time to speak.

choices.title: Declare Your Right
choices.description: You stand tall. Your words strike. They are yours.
choices.message: The crowd roars. Your power is undeniable. They see you as their leader, and you stand as their sole path to salvation.

choices.title: Proclaim Doomsday
choices.description: You tell them of the end. They kneel. Your word is gospel.
choices.message: They kneel before you, their faith unbreakable. The comet grows closer in their hearts, and the vision of doomsday becomes their singular truth.

title: The Astral Invocation
description: You reach into the void. Xenu waits. Will you call him?

choices.title: Summon Xenu
choices.description: You demand his presence. You call out. The silence responds.
choices.message: Xenu’s presence fills the air. Your followers are shaken but inspired. Your faith in his power is now known.

choices.title: Invoke Xenu in Silence
choices.description: You wait. Silent. The void answers, but so do the watchers.
choices.message: The silence is broken. The authorities move in. They watch with suspicion. The ritual continues, but at a price.
